name: Lincolnshire Day Ranger
description:
LINCOLNSHIRE DAY RANGER Unlimited travel for one day with weekday time restrictions extending from Doncaster in the north to Peterborough and Stamford in the south and from Nottingham in the 
      west to the east coast towns of Cleethorpes and Skegness and includes Grantham and Lincoln. Note that the Lincolnshire Day Ranger is NOT valid on Saturdays in July & August and is not valid between Doncaster and Grantham nor between Grantham and Peterborough 
      on LNER services.
